charity.title: CharityKit
charity.text1: Associate your image with causes that are dear to you
charity.text2: Include your customers in your company's CSR commitments
charity.text3: Transform your sales site into a collection point for associations
charity.description: If you have already created your CharityKit space, log in now to offer solidarity rounding to your customers.
charity.space_description: Go to your CharityKit space to form partnerships with associations.
